nodes.bodyText: I think that here a comment is in order to explain why we add plugin jar to jsp classpath. It is far from obvious from the context why it is done so.
I think this method deserves either a renaming or a javadoc to explain we are looking up for the sonar-java plugin
this would probably be more robust to call for getJavaClasspath rather than relying on order of callers for javaclasspath to be initialized.
